extension.description: Neon started as the excelent Night skin by mcborzu. It was almost perfect for me but I missed some aspects of Aeon and other skins. So credit where credit is due - the majority of this originated as mcborzu's work...and inspiration from djh_ and huge thanks for Jezz_x's work on Conflunce where I have 'borrowed' liberal amounts of knowledge, code and graphics!
